p: Aside from the direct implications of liver disease on the course of COVID-19 or vice versa, there are several additional aspects that require attention. The current pandemic and the amount of available information – including misinformation and rumours – result in uncertainties and concerns among patients but also healthcare providers. While the threat that COVID-19 poses should not be underestimated, it remains important to maintain care of patients with chronic liver disease and to identify potential ways to prioritise care of these patients in times of limited healthcare resources.
